1126570.name: Video deluxe 2020 Steam Edition
1126570.description:
Import media, add the final touches and share with your community – it can all be done quickly with Video deluxe 2020 - Steam Edition. In no time at all, you can transform your recordings into one-of-a-kind videos in impressive quality.

Easy, fast and high quality

Experience butter-smooth video results on screen, even for the most action-packed scenes. The new, ultra-fast INFUSION Engine now processes effects, templates and transitions up to 8.6x faster. If your footage is choppy in places, simply use the new professional image stabilization tool to transform it into a premium gameplay video.

Customized to your workflow

Get a clear overview of the action! You can adjust the editing interface layout to match your experience level and choose between the simplified storyboard view or the more detailed timeline. Plus, you can freely rearrange all tracks in a project so that you don't miss any important moments in your footage. Bring your gameplays to the next level with the large selection of effects, which enable you to make the action even more epic.

Highlights:

  • NEW! Fast INFUSION Engine
  • NEW! Professional image stabilization
  • Up to 900 effects, titles, templates & transitions
  • Easy color correction
  • Import & export in 4K/UHD
1126570.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
